column4: alright, time to watch Gwar Live from Antarctica and got to sleep
also, I think some ID games will keep you on black screens if they can't connect to the sound device, but I could be wrong
ok, where you able to get back into X fine then?
did you try the what reka said?
what sound server do you run?
well, you can restart esd easily once you're done playing with 'esd &'
either kill esd before you want to play doom3, then start esd afterwards with 'esd &' or look on the forums for a way to make doom3 work with ESD.
I'm not sure if all the GNOME apps will like that.
a good solution would be to make a little script to start doom3 for you.
what is the command to start doom3? simply 'doom3'?
alright, give me a minute. I don't do much scripting, so I'm not sure if this will be good or not heh
